name: Kilobaser
headline: Desktop DNA Printer. The Nespresso Machine for DNA.
description: We combined microfluidic chip technology and a reagent cartridge to create the first personal DNA synthesizer. Until now most life scientists had to rely on out-sourced DNA synthesis, causing stagnating research. Kilobaser empowers every life scientist to synthesize DNA on their benchtop.

founders.name: Bernhard Tittelbach, Founder
founders.description:
Likes to have an ever more accurate model of the world. Interested in how things work. Likes to take apart, hack and create things, to understand them better. Interested in various frameworks that allow people to work together.
Sometimes Speaker at talks, helper at events and holder of workshops.
Life Goal: Create net gain for everyone, leave the world a slightly better place and come out ahead as well.
Would love for everyone to learn rationality and probability theory in school.

![Kilobaser device with microfluidic chips and reagent cartridge](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/DNA-RNA-Synthesizer_Kilobaser-one-XT_closed.webp)
# Kilobaser one-Xt
## Personal DNA & RNA Synthesizer
World’s first microfluidic chip and cartridge based DNA and RNA synthesizer. Produce custom DNA and RNA on demand. Fast. Affordable. Independent.
[View Details](https://www.kilobaser.com/</dna-and-rna-synthesizer>)
## Kilobaser Customers
#### Explore what other life-science-professionals say
![Amitabha Sarkar, PhD](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Testimonials/Kilobaser-Testimonial_MatMaCorp_Amitabha-Sarkar.webp)
### Amitabha Sarkar, PhD
Research Engineer at MatMaCorp
“The Kilobaser is amazing [..] It’s easy to use and does its job. Getting it delivered to my lab was a really nice surprise. [..] I like our Kilobaser.”
![Amitabha Sarkar, PhD](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Testimonials/Kilobaser-Testimonial_MatMaCorp_Amitabha-Sarkar.webp)
### Amitabha Sarkar, PhD
Research Engineer at MatMaCorp
“The Kilobaser is amazing [..] It’s easy to use and does its job. Getting it delivered to my lab was a really nice surprise. [..] I like our Kilobaser.”
![Tam Yew Joon, PhD](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Testimonials/Kilobaser-Testimonial_BioGenes_Tam-Yew-Joon.webp)
### Tam Yew Joon, PhD
Chief Scientific Officer at Biogenes Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
"Kilobaser is certainly a game-changer in the world of oligo synthesis and we are proud to be a part of this revolutionary journey"
![Sérgio Nozawa, PhD](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Testimonials/Kilobaser-Testimonial_Evolutta-Agro-Biotech_Sergio-Nozawa.webp)
### Sérgio Nozawa, PhD
CSO & Gov. Affairs at Evolutta Agro Biotech
“[Until now] I tried to build small oligos around 20 to 25 oligos and everything went very well. […] Generally, I am very very satisfied with the product. It is the first Kilobaser in Brazil."
![Dr. Flavia Gama Gomes Leite](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Testimonials/Kilobaser-Testimonial_IST-Austria_Flavia-Gama-Gomes-Leite.webp)
### Dr. Flavia Gama Gomes Leite
Virologist at IST Austria
“We tested Kilobaser and were very satisfied with the results. PCRs were successfully performed and we anticipate that such an equipment would be a valuable asset to any lab that does molecular cloning.”
![Rüdiger Trojok, Diplom Biologist](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Testimonials/Kilobaser-Testimonial_UnternehmerTUM_Rüdiger-Trojok.webp)
### Rüdiger Trojok, Diplom Biologist
Laboratory Lead at UnternehmerTUM
"Kilobaser is a great product that is very much needed in times like this. It prints DNA that can be tested against samples within 2h."
![Kilobaser personal DNA and RNA synthesizer in benchtop size. Print your DNA oligos, RNA oligos and DNA probes on demand.](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/DNA-RNA-Synthesizer_Kilobaser-one-XT_Shop.webp)
![Kilobaser DNA Synthesizer machine for in-house DNA Synthesis. Microfluidic chip based. Synthesize DNA oligos, DNA primer, DNA probes in less than 2h. Standard DNA cartridge for benchtop DNA Synthesizer.](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/Standard-DNA_Cartridge_Kilobaser_Shop.webp)
![6-FAM DNA reagent cartridge for Kilobaser one-XT personal DNA & RNA synthesizer.](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/6-FAM-DNA_Cartridge_Kilobaser_Shop.webp)
![](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/2'-MOE-RNA_Cartridge_Kilobaser_Shop.webp)
![Microfluidic Chip with integrated CPG column, modified with BHQ1- Quencher dye, for DNA probe synthesis. Kilobaser DNA Synthesizer machine for in-house DNA Synthesis. Microfluidic chip based. Synthesize DNA oligos, DNA primer, DNA probes in less than 2h.](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/Biotin-Label__5-Chips_Kilobaser_Shop.webp)
## Unlimited Capabilities
Create a base of reagent cartridges and microfluidic chips to synthesize your custom DNA and RNA oligos, probes and more at any time.
[browse our shop](https://www.kilobaser.com/</webshop>)
## Our latest applications and protocols
[![](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Posts/One-Step-RT-qPCR_Application-Note_Kilobaser_Post-Visual.svg)](https://www.kilobaser.com/</one-step-rt-qpcr-application-note>)
#### One step RT-qPCR to detect SARS-Cov-2
[![](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Posts/Colony-PCR_Application-Note_Kilobaser_Post-Visual.webp)](https://www.kilobaser.com/</colony-pcr-application-note>)
#### Colony PCR to detect BAC in E. Coli
[![](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Posts/Corona-Primer_Application-Note_Kilobaser_Post-Visual.webp)](https://www.kilobaser.com/</real-time-qpcr-application-note>)
#### Real time qPCR to detect Covid-19 infection
## Ordering oligos online: over and out!
#### We all know the troubles it brings
Free yourself from complicated ordering processes, delivery times and high modification costs!
We show you how! In a live online demo, you will get a feeling for how easy it is to independently produce custom DNA and RNA resources. We will answer all your questions about Kilobaser and together we will find out how you can improve and accelerate your workflow.
Book an appointment of your choice and enter a lab world full of possibilities. We look forward to seeing you!
[Book your demo](https://www.kilobaser.com/</demo>)
![](https://www.kilobaser.com/content/Images/Products/Kilobaser_DNA-RNA-Synthesizer_in-Lab_1.webp)
#### You don't want to miss any Kilobaser news in the future?
[Join our E-Mail List](https://www.kilobaser.com/</newsletter-registration>)

generated_description:
**Kilobaser Overview**

**Founded:** 2014  
**Location:** Graz, Austria  
**Team Size:** 10 Employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W21  
**Website:** [Kilobaser](https://www.kilobaser.com)

---

**Mission & Vision**  
Kilobaser is on a clear mission to democratize access to DNA synthesis with its innovative product: the **Kilobaser One-XT**, the first microfluidic chip and cartridge-based personal DNA and RNA synthesizer. This device aims to revolutionize laboratory practices by allowing life scientists to synthesize custom DNA right at their benchtops—no more waiting for outsourced services. Think of it as the **Nespresso Machine for DNA**. 

**The Problem**  
Traditionally, researchers faced long delays and inflated costs when outsourcing DNA synthesis. This bottleneck has stifled innovation in life sciences. Kilobaser aims to empower researchers by putting the power of DNA synthesis in their hands, significantly speeding up the research process.

**Product Offerings**  
Kilobaser’s main product is the **Kilobaser One-XT**, which enables users to create custom DNA and RNA on-demand quickly, efficiently, and independently. They also offer a variety of cartridges for different applications, including **sample oligos** and **multi-rack systems** for larger production needs.

**Use Cases & Impact**  
Users are finding various applications for the Kilobaser synthesizers. From supporting PCR testing for SARS-CoV-2 to assisting in molecular cloning, this technology unlocks possibilities that were previously confined to larger labs with more resources.

**Customer Experiences**  
Testimonials from researchers indicate that Kilobaser is a game-changer. Users appreciate the ease of operation and the quick delivery of results. For instance, Tam Yew Joon, CSO of Biogenes Technologies, calls it a "game-changer" in the world of oligo synthesis.

**Technical Edge**  
Kilobaser's technology combines microfluidic precision with the simplicity of a cartridge system. This unique approach not only lowers the barrier to entry for DNA synthesis in research but also promises higher efficiency in producing oligonucleotides.

**Market Positioning**  
Kilobaser operates in the niche of hard-tech hardware and medical devices, focusing on life sciences. This positioning allows them to tap into a market that is rapidly embracing in-house solutions for DNA and RNA synthesis.

**Engagement Opportunities**  
For those interested in exploring Kilobaser's offerings, the company provides opportunities for live demonstrations to truly understand the simplicity and impact of their technology. You can also order sample oligos and book online demos through their website.

---

In a nutshell, Kilobaser is not just selling a product; they are enabling a new paradigm in DNA synthesis that empowers researchers to experiment, innovate, and accelerate breakthroughs—right from their own labs. If you're involved in life sciences and want to upgrade your capabilities, you’ll definitely want to keep an eye on Kilobaser.
